header.subtitle: Everything you need to fast-track your digital transformation, with the open, light-weight digital platform.

digit-strategy.title: Your digital strategy
digit-strategy.subtitle-1: Ideas for digital products and services, existing monolithic applications, existing IT infrastructure, back-end applications, your development team and IT staff.
digit-strategy.subtitle-2: Use only parts of the platform vital for your digital transformation

digit-platform.title: A network of interconnected, scalable and agile digital applications

what-can.title: What KumuluzDigital platform can do for you

left.para-1: KumuluzDigital platform is the award-winning solution that companies use to implement and accelerate their digital transformation.
left.para-2: KumuluzDigital Platform provides you all the building blocks necessary to fast-track the development of your digital business. The platform enables you the implementation of your digital strategy.
left.para-3: With KumuluzDigital, you will introduce the latest cloud-native concepts, microservices, APIs and Docker containers. You will adopt agile development, DevOps principles and Continuous Delivery to fast track your development. You will be finally able to modernize your monolithic applications. You will develop sophisticated user experience and complex marketplace solutions.

right.para-1: The benefits are enormous. You will significantly reduce time-to-market for your digital products, services, applications and marketplace solution with using our platform, agile, DevOps and other cloud-native methods for continuous delivery.

para-2.text: KumuluzDigital offers you the tools to create sophisticated responsive user experience, rapidly develop your own digital marketplaces, implement API economy business models, communicate with your customers in new ways, engage customers, sense their needs and respond instantly, gather digital payments and add many other exciting features, indispensable for the digital economy.

api.title: KumuluzAPI

header.subtitle: Overview and manage your APIs in one place. Get ready for the API economy.

items.item-1: Auto API discovery and catalogue population
items.item-2: Multiple gateways support with full security, rate limiting and authentication
items.item-3: One platform for monitoring, metrics, documentation, API search etc.

about.title: About the product
about.strong: Expose, manage, control and monetize your APIs and get ready for the API economy.
about.text:
KumuluzAPI is a lightweight, open, standards-based solution for API Management, API Catalogue, API Gateway, API Marketplace with complete support for cataloguing API-related schemas, such as XML Schemas and JSON documents, providing full insight into APIs, their usage, relations, schemes and dependencies.

It is based on the microservice architecture with full elasticity, scalability and high availability. Functionalities are exposed through APIs and responsive web applications. The KumuluzAPI solution is built to easily integrate with various backend systems, such as ESB, SOA, BPM, different development environments, DevOps (Continuous Integration and Delivery) and more.

The product provides support for multiple languages. Currently full support for English and Slovenian is provided. Multiple language support might be important for digitalization within the country and region.

box.title: Why should you choose KumuluzAPI?
box.item-4: Auto API discovery and catalogue population

features.title: Main features
features.item-1: Create a catalogue of services and their APIs for REST and SOAP
features.item-2: Automatically discover APIs and services and populate the catalogue without manual intervention
features.item-3: Integrate with DevOps and Continuous integration/delivery
features.item-4: Document your APIs in a standard, language- and technology independent way
features.item-5: Search, filter, test APIs and services
features.item-6: Full versioning support for APIs on different environments and simultaneous version support
features.item-8: Full support for microservices and integration with KumuluzEE
features.item-9: Dependency analysis and visualization for APIs, applications and schemas
features.item-10: Included schema (XSD/JSON) support for searching and viewing schemas used in APIs, including dependency analysis in visualization
features.item-11: Multiple plans, SLA, QoS, rate limiting and monetization options
features.item-14: Multiple gateways support with full security, rate-limiting and authentication support through multiple providers (such as LDAP, OAuth2, Kerberos, etc.)
features.item-17: Support for application servers, virtualized environments, PaaS and Docker-style environments

customer.title: Customers & Use Cases
customer.subtitle: Customers & Use Cases
customer.content:
Where can you use KumuluzAPI?

You have a few services that you want to expose to third parties. For example, the municipality could use KumuluzAPI to expose the land register to some other branch of government. With the KumuluzAPI you can manage who has access to the exposed APIs and who's using them, you have a central management platform for everything. Additionally, KumuluzAPI handles security for you, so you only need to manage who is allowed to use the exposed services.

motto.title: APIs allow different applications to talk to each other.
motto.subtitle: However, API management can lead to security problems, performance issues and lower productivity if not done properly.

benefits.title: Main benefits and features of KumuluzAPI
benefits.subtitle: Lightweight, open, standards-based solution for API Management.

item-1.title: Dynamic APIs discovery
item-1.desc: You can discover APIs either through the API Catalogue or in a programmatic way using ZooKeeper as a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.

item-2.title: Advanced API usage analytics
item-2.desc: Analytics on API usage, client requests, responses, geolocation of requests, responses, etc. is provided. Reports can be generated automatically. Furthermore, all data can be exported into a Big Data/Analytics tool for further analysis.

item-3.title: Monitor your system in real time
item-3.desc: Real-time monitoring of API health, response times, requests, API clients, gateway performance and scalability and other parameters are supported. Full support for specifying SLA requirements for each API are provided with real-time monitoring of SLA compliance and alarms when SLA parameters are not meet.

item-4.title: Diagnose and log requests/responses
item-4.desc: All requests and responses over gateways are logged. History, the audit trail of requests and responses, is available online or in a generated report. Supports full API diagnostics. Active API monitoring is performed in user-configurable intervals (for example every 5 minutes). Active service health is performed and real-time diagnostics, monitoring and alarm notifications are supported.

item-5.title: Rule-based SLA control
item-5.desc: KumuluzAPI provides full QoS and SLA control. This includes request throttling, which is rule based and can be flexibly configured. All throttling is related to the usage plan. Each API can have one or more usage plans. Fully automatic inbound and outbound SOAP/REST and XSD/JSON transformations are supported and can be configured for each gateway.

item-6.title: Dynamic APIs discovery
item-6.desc: You can discover APIs either through the API Catalogue or in a programmatic way using ZooKeeper as a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.

item-1.text: Use modern web applications to manage configuration and your APIs.

item-2.bold: Programmatically through APIs exposed by KumuluzEE
item-2.text: All configuration is available through KumuluzEE APIs. You can use this to manage your APIs programmatically.

item-3.bold: Automatic API configuration at build time
item-3.text: At build time, direct integration with Jenkins and Maven enables that APIs are configured, documented and registered automatically as part of the build cycle.

item-4.bold: Automatic API configuration at deploy time
item-4.text: At deploy-time, APIs are configured, documented and registered as part of the deploy procedure, utilizing tight integration with the Nexus repository of artefacts.

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.para: The documentation of APIs can be either entered manually through UI or automatically integrated.

item-1.text: Basic documentation is auto-generated from WSDL for SOAP services and from Swagger or RAML for REST services.

item-2.text: Complete solution for documenting APIs in a standardized and conformant way, including full documentation, dependencies, UML diagrams, BPMN diagrams and other means of documentation.

item-3.text: API documentation options also include markdown.

publishing.title: API Publishing
publishing.para: You can publish your own APIs to reduce data silos in your company or build relationships with outside developers.

item-1.bold: API publishing is supported via API gateways.
item-1.text: Each API can be published for one or more organizations and on one or more gateways.

item-2.bold: Publishing APIs for different target groups
item-2.text: APIs can be published for different target user groups. Each API can be published for one or more organizations and on one or more gateways.

item-3.text: For each gateway, security, authentication, rate limiting, SLA and other parameters can be individually configured.

security.title: API Security & authentication
security.content:
REST services can be secured using SSL/TLS, for authentication OAuth, basic HTTP, SAML, custom security headers and nonces are supported.

The authentication provider can be one or more external providers, such as LDAP, Oauth2, Kerberos, etc. SOAP services can be secured using WS-Security. Username, X.509 and SAML profiles are supported. Additionally, basic HTTP and SSL/TLS are supported.

For each endpoint, full endpoint validation can be enabled. Endpoint translation from gateway to server (virtual endpoint resolution) is automatic.

ee.title: KumuluzEE

items.item-3: Cloud native architecture with the smallest JAR
items.item-4: Supports Java, JavaEE/JakartaEE, Node.js, Go and other languages

left.title: Develop microservices with Java technologies and support for other languages.
left.para-1: is a lightweight framework for developing microservices using standard Java, JavaEE/JakartaEE technologies and migrating existing Java applications to microservices. KumuluzEE packages microservices as standalone JARs. KumuluzEE microservices are lightweight and optimized for size and start-up time. They fit perfectly with Docker containers.
left.para-2: KumuluzEE also provides extensions for developing common patterns in cloud native architectures, including configuration, logging, discovery, circuit-breakers, metrics, security, event streaming and more.
left.para-3: KumuluzEE supports Java, Node.js, Go and other programming languages. It also provides support for Blockchain, gRPC, GraphQL and many other advanced technologies.

features.title: Main features
features.left-para-1: KumuluzEE allows you to decompose Java applications into microservices and prepare them for cloud-native architecture. It allows you to create standalone lightweight Java and JavaEE/JakartaEE microservices that can be efficiently deployed, executed and scaled in the cloud on PaaS and Docker-like environments or as standalone applications. It also supports other languages, such as Node.js, Go, and more.
features.left-para-2: KumuluzEE microservices have a minimal footprint and require minimal or no configuration. KumuluzEE automates tasks related to the deployment and configuration of Java microservices, thus overcoming the major drawback of the microservice architecture and eliminating the need for an application server.

item-1.title: Develop Java and JavaEE/JakartaEE microservices ready for the Cloud

item-2.title: Migrate existing Java and JavaEE applications to microservices

item-3.title: Minimal footprint, efficient deployment and scalability in the Cloud

item-1.quote: KumuluzEE is a great community effort to power Java EE API based microservices, especially on the cloud.

item-2.quote: KumuluzEE truly brings microservice architecture to Java EE. Maven-ready, Fat JAR, modularized dependencies, Docker-ready, and pluggable web container makes it ready to be deployable in any cloud environment. If you are building apps using Java EE, start your microservice journey with KumuluzEE!
item-2.author-title: Vice President, Developer Relations at Couchbase

item-3.quote: Although Java EE specifications and application servers have come down in size, it still wasn't a first technology choice for today's micro services developer when compared to say NodeJS or Spring Boot. That's now changed as KumuluzEE brings a light-weight, application server free way of creating micro services with the full power of Java, the JVM and JavaEE behind it! This innovative stack is truly a worthy Duke Awards winner in 2015.
item-3.author-title: Java Champion and CEO of jClarity

item-4.quote: If you are exploring Microservices for Java EE, you need to take a look at KumuluzEE's novel yet simple approach to automating microservices for you.
item-4.author-title: Java Champion and Founder of Rightrix Solutions and IndicThreads

right.title: Enterprise
right.item-1: Migration of existing Java EE applications
right.item-2: Full interoperability with Java EE application servers
right.item-4: Solution for integrated documentation of microservices

motto.title: KumuluzEE is part of MicroProfile
motto.subtitle: The MicroProfile is a baseline platform definition that optimizes Enterprise Java for a microservices architecture and delivers application portability across multiple MicroProfile runtimes.

benefits.title: Main benefits and features of KumuluzEE
benefits.subtitle: Develop microservices with Java EE technologies

after-text.text: your digital applications in a future-proof way.

item-1.title: Pure Java EE based microservices
item-1.desc: Develop pure Java EE based microservices using standard Java EE APIs and technologies and pack and execute them as stand-alone (Fat/Uber) JARs.

item-2.title: Leverage your existing knowledge to migrate applications
item-2.desc: Leverage your existing Java EE knowledge and extend it to gradually migrate existing Java EE applications to microservices and cloud-native architecture with common cloud-native patterns.

item-3.title: Configurable Java EE environment
item-3.desc: KumuluzEE is not a traditional Java EE app server, neither does it embed an app-server inside microservices. It provides configurable Java EE environment inside stand-alone JARs, which only require JRE (Java Runtime Environment) to execute.

item-4.title: Fastest start-up & small footprint
item-4.desc: KumuluzEE generates pure, efficient Java microservices, which start considerably faster and have lower footprint than the majority of other Java microservice frameworks. Microservices are light-weight with small footprint, rapid start and container-ready.

item-5.title: Open source
item-5.desc: KumuluzEE is fully open, standard-based and extensible.

item-6.title: Zero lock-in
item-6.desc: KumuluzEE does not require any specific code. Everything is configured in pom.xml. You have the complete control over Java EE components you are using.

item-7.title: Integrated with Kumuluz family
item-7.desc: KumuluzEE is fully integrated with KumuluzAPI, an innovative microservice API Management and other Kumuluz and KumuluzDigital products.

item-8.title: Compatible with Docker and Kubernetes
item-8.desc: KumuluzEE microservices can be packed as Docker containers and provide full support for container environments. These microservices are fully compatible with Kubernetes.

item-9.title: API gateway support and more
item-9.desc: KumuluzEE provides full support for configuration, service discovery, health, logging, security, fault tolerance, circuit-breakers, event streaming, metrics, REST patterns and more. KumuluzEE microservices provide first-class support for API gateways

migration.title: Migration to microservices
migration.subtitle: Gradually migrate existing Java and JavaEE applications to the microservice architecture

item-1.title: Support for gradual migration
item-1.desc: KumuluzEE provides full support for gradual migration of existing Java EE applications to the microservice architecture. Step-by-step migration is supported, allowing you to extract one or more services from existing applications and migrate them to microservices.

item-2.title: Classical Java EE application server
item-2.desc: Part of your application can run as a microservice and the rest of the application can continue to operate on your classical Java EE application server. KumuluzEE provides full interoperability for container authentication, CDI, remote EJB calls, remote JMS, data sources, etc.

item-3.title: Interoperability
item-3.desc: Microservices build with KumuluzEE will have native interoperability with the rest of the applications on your Java EE application server.

comparison.title: Comparison with other solutions
comparison.subtitle: Comparison with other solutions
comparison.para-1: When selecting a framework for Java microservices, you should consider the start-up time, size and memory footprint of a microservice.

para-2.link: Java EE microservices: why start-up time and size matter
para-2.after: shows an interesting comparison of MicroProfile Java EE frameworks, including WebSphere Liberty, WildFly Swarm, Payara, TomEE and KumuluzEE.

comparison.para-3: KumuluzEE has achieved the fastest start-up time of 3 seconds and the smallest JAR size of 11 MB:

item-1.title: Cloud-native
item-1.desc: KumuluzEE allows you to extend your microservices with common cloud-native patterns.

item-2.title: Support for cloud-native patterns
item-2.desc: KumuluzEE provides full support for config, discovery, health, logging, security, fault tolerance, circuit breakers, event streaming, metrics, REST patterns, gRPC, GraphQL, Blockchain and more.

item-3.title: Docker containers
item-3.desc: KumuluzEE microservices can be packed as Docker containers and provide full support for container environments.

item-4.title: Optimized for Kubernetes
item-4.desc: KumuluzEE microservices are fully optimized for Kubernetes, including configuration, service discovery, health, metrics and fault tolerance.

framework.title: Complete and comprehensive framework
framework.subtitle: Complete and comprehensive framework
framework.item-1: KumuluzEE REST for implementation of common, advanced and flexible REST API functionalities and patterns. Includes support for exposing JPA entities through REST.
framework.item-2: KumuluzEE Config for dynamic centralized configuration (using ENV variables or config server, such as etcd or Consul).
framework.item-3: KumuluzEE Logs for advanced microservice framework for logging.
framework.item-4: KumuluzEE Discovery for dynamic service discovery (etcd or Consul). Fully compatible with Kubernetes.
framework.item-5: KumuluzEE Metrics for easy collection and reporting of performance metrics.
framework.item-6: KumuluzEE Security for easy integration with OAuth2/OpenID identity and access management providers.
framework.item-7: KumuluzEE Health for implementing health checks and exposing microservice health information.
framework.item-8: KumuluzEE Fault Tolerance for implementing fault tolerance patterns, circuit breakers, and decoupling microservices.
framework.item-9: KumuluzEE Event Streaming for event streaming support using Apache Kafka.
framework.item-10: KumuluzEE Reactive for integration of reactive streams (Vert.x, ReactiveX).
framework.item-11: KumuluzEE CORS for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) support.
framework.item-12: KumuluzEE Swagger for Swagger (OpenAPI 2) support and visualization.
framework.item-13: KumuluzEE OpenAPI for OpenAPI 3 support, interface generation and visualization.
framework.item-14: KumuluzEE Testing for providing tools and utilities for testing KumuluzEE microservices.
framework.item-15: KumuluzEE gRPC for native support for gRPC based services.
framework.item-16: KumuluzEE GraphQL for native support for GraphQL.

integration.title: KumuluzIntegration

header.subtitle: Bring all your data to one place and become a data-driven organization

items.item-1: Real-time data integration from any source
items.item-2: Choose from amongst many pre-prepared integrations from our library
items.item-3: No integration hassle, at an affordable price

left.title: Integrate on-premise applications, SaaS and IoT devices with on premise back-end applications.
left.para-1: addresses integration challenges between SaaS applications and/or on premise applications. KumuluzIntegration enables you to integrate and synchronize your SaaS and/or on premise applications in a matter of minutes.
left.para-2: Using cutting edge innovations in data integration, such as event driven integration, automatic schema matching and building common data models makes integration easier and faster. The data between applications is synchronized in real time.

item-2.title: Reduced migration time
item-2.desc: 75% to 90% reduced migration time from legacy applications to SaaS.

item-3.title: Pre-prepared integrations
item-3.desc: A rich set of pre-prepared integrations for popular commercial apps.

item-4.title: Save costs
item-4.desc: At least 20% less expensive than direct competition and more than 50% lower Total Cost of Ownership.

motto.title: We live in a time when data is considered as new Oil.
motto.subtitle: Kumuluz integration platform enables you to bring data together from different sources and most importantly helps you refine your data.

benefits.title: Main benefits and features of KumuluzIntegration
benefits.subtitle: Fast, scalable and simplified real-time data integration that will give a completely new edge to your business intelligence.

after-text.text: your digital applications in a future-proof way.

item-1.title: Hub-based integration architecture
item-1.desc: Requires only one adapter per application, irrespective of the number of integrated applications.

item-2.title: Automatic schema matching
item-2.desc: Uses pattern based identification of matching data and enables automatic or semi automatic generation of data mapping, which greatly reduces time and effort, particularly for large and complex schemas.

item-3.title: Cross-provider common data model generation
item-3.desc: Automatically builds a joint common data model of all integrated applications, enabling a 360° view of data, exposing master data entities, enabling Big Data analytics, data mining and reporting, and greatly simplifying mobile device data access.

item-4.title: Event driven, real-time integration
item-4.desc: Changes are synced to integrated applications in the moment they occur.

item-5.title: Simplified integration of IoT enabled devices
item-5.desc: Integrate your SaaS and on-premise applications with IoT enabled devices through easy-to-understand business APIs, which makes your integrations independent of the underlying technology and protocols, reduces vendor lock-in and enables use of different IoT devices in a transparent way.

item-6.title: Pre-implemented and open-source adapters
item-6.desc: Large set of pre-implemented adapters and open-source models for community adapter development. It has never been easier to select a pre-developed adapter or to develop your own adapter.

ux.title: KumuluzUx

header.subtitle: Sophisticated framework for enterprise-grade web and mobile user interfaces with a superb experience.

items.item-1: Rich set of advanced HTML5 and JSF components

left.title: Create sophisticated enterprise-grade responsive web and mobile applications
left.para:
KumuluzUX Web/Mobile Framework provides a rich set of advanced HTML5 and JSF components for rapid development of enterprise-grade web and mobile user interfaces with superb user experience.

The competitive advantage of KumuluzUX are sophisticated composite components for a rapid development of web forms, human tasks, business process interaction, reports and other common interfaces in enterprise information systems. KumuluzUX includes custom components for enterprise-grade user interfaces from the domains of banking, finance, insurance and power distribution. With KumuluzUX, such interfaces and/or forms and reports can be developed with single line of code.

item-1.title: Sophisticated composite components
item-1.desc: For the development of web forms, human tasks, business process interaction, reports and other common interfaces.

item-2.title: Rapid development of web forms
item-2.desc: Interfaces and/or forms and reports can be developed with a single line of code.

item-3.title: Custom components
item-3.desc: For enterprise-grade user interfaces from the domains of banking, finance, insurance and power distribution.

features.title: Main features
features.item-1: Rich set of advanced HTML5 and JSF components for rapid development of enterprise grade web and mobile user interfaces
features.item-2: Full support for BPM and human task integration with integration with IBM BPM, Oracle SOA/BPM Suite and JBoss jBPM
features.item-4: Easy integration of different applications into a common UI
features.item-6: Domain specific components for banking, finance, insurance and power distribution

motto.title: User experience is key. It’s the difference between keeping and losing customers.
motto.subtitle: With KumuluzUX, you don’t need to worry about how it will look on different platforms (mobile, web). KumuluzUX takes care of that and displays your product responsively.

benefits.title: Main benefits and features of KumuluzUX
benefits.subtitle: Create sophisticated enterprise-grade progressive, responsive and fluid web and mobile applications with a superb user experience, BPM integration and omni-channel support.

item-1.title: Rich set of advanced HTML5 and JSF components
item-1.desc: Use KumuluzUX advanced components for a rapid development of enterprise grade web and mobile user interfaces.

item-2.title: Generate layouts from data source
item-2.desc: KumuluzUX can generate layouts and render the content directly from a data source, ranging from APIs, services, SOAP, REST and OData to data sources such as JDBC, ODBC and JPA.

item-3.title: BPM integration
item-3.desc: KumuluzUX provides tight BPM integration with a rich set of components for rapid development of process applications using IBM BPM, Oracle SOA/BPM Suite and/or JBoss jBPM.

item-4.title: State management and reporting
item-4.desc: KumuluzUX provides specific components for state management and reporting.

item-5.title: Domain integration
item-5.desc: Domain specific components for banking, finance, insurance and power distribution.
